Property.name: AnimTestThingie
Property.HelpText: Enable this and press B, X, and Y at the same time during gameplay to activate. See ReadMe for further details and controls.

Property.name: UseEXTRALayouts
Property.HelpText: Enable this to use the EXTRA layout files that were previously part of the Dreamcast Conversion mod. They add some unused objects to some levels.

Property.name: JackleCard
Property.HelpText: Enable to allow the normally unused Jackle card to appear on the Nights pinball table.

Property.name: DTargetRing
Property.HelpText: Fixes the ring that is meant to encircle the purple drop targets on the pinball boards by actually making it encircle them.

Property.name: NightRankCrystal
Property.HelpText: Enable this to fix the UVs on the normally unused rank crystal object when it lands on a F rank.

Property.name: LostLight
Property.HelpText: Replaces the normally unused (and broken) large light model in Lost World with its proper Dreamcast counterpart.

Property.name: AwningColor
Property.HelpText: Removes the material color from the unused orange awning object in Speed Highway. (No need to use if using the Autodemo Speed Highway mod.)

Property.name: WindyValleyLeaves
Property.HelpText: Restores the normally unused leaf effect when entering a wind gust object. (Fully compatible with Autodemo Windy Valley.)

Property.name: WindyValleyTornado
Property.HelpText: Fixes some coding with the final's tornado to: make all 3 types of leaves sucked up by the tornado, and make it sometimes suck up a rhino tank. (Fully compatible with Autodemo Windy Valley.)

Property.name: CutsceneFixes
Property.HelpText: Enable this to fix Chaos 2's elevation when he first appears in front of Knuckles in the cutscene prior to the boss fight with him.

Property.name: BigBetaHotel
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Big's beta hotel puzzle part of the normal story campaign.

Property.name: SkyDeckDrawDist
Property.display: Sky Deck Light Objects Draw Distance
Property.HelpText: Enable this to increase the draw distance of two light objects in Sky Deck that are often too far away to see in the level.

Property.name: StarJumpPanel
Property.HelpText: Enable to add the unused beta star panel to the end of each jump panel sequence.

Property.name: TGSModeActive
Property.HelpText: Enable to allow access to the TGS Mode by pressing L + R on any menu outside of the main game. See more details in the ReadMe.

Property.name: WaterBridge
Property.HelpText: Enable to make small, unused metal models appear along the side of the water bridge in Emerald Coast Act 1 that were meant to appear along it.

Property.name: Chaos0Plants
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make the plant objects seen in the Unveiling version of the Chaos 0 fight show up in-game.

Property.name: PatrolCopter
Property.HelpText: Enable this to restore the beta patrol helicopters on the Egg Carrier with hypothetical behavior. (Will only appear while airborne.)

Property.name: Lightning
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make the Egg Carrier's beta lightning effect work. (Will only appear while airbrone.)

Property.name: GoodSign
Property.HelpText: Enable this to add an unused model with an unused texture that says "Good!" to the E G G M A N button machine for the Chao Garden Room.

Property.name: AngelDoor
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make the door to the outside area of Angel Island actually use its opening and closing animations when you approach it.

Property.name: SPRActivate
Property.HelpText: Enable this to allow the SPR Task to be toggled on-screen with the C button. To use the C button, you'll need to use the Input Fix mod.

Property.name: RedMountainPillar
Property.HelpText: Enable this to restore an unused pillar model to the very start of Red Mountain Act 2. (No need to use if using the Autodemo Red Mountain mod.)

Property.name: MRFinalEggTransAnim
Property.display: Mystic Ruins Final Egg Transport Animation
Property.HelpText: Enable this to restore an unused animation for the entrance to the Final Egg Base in Mystic Ruins. When you enter it, you'll see a transport pod move through the tube.

Property.name: MysticRuinsJungleNightNoise
Property.HelpText: Enable this to fix a normally unused feature for the jungle: at night, the sounds heard inside the jungle will change. Also fixes MR Base sound issue. Details in ReadMe.

Property.name: LostWorldDrawDist
Property.display: Lost World Snake Room Platforms Draw Distance
Property.HelpText: Enable this to improve the draw distance of the platforms in the snake room, greatly reducing pop-in and ensuring that the switches aren't seen floating.

Property.name: LostWorldSpikeJAP
Property.display: Lost World Spike Trap Japanese Behavior
Property.HelpText: Enable this to change the moving spike traps in Lost World to the Japanese versions. JP: each one moves independently. International: all move at once.

Property.name: SpeedHighwayTrashcan
Property.HelpText: Enable this to fix the positioning of the models for the final version of the unused trashcan object. This will not revert it to its Autodemo design.

Property.name: TikalFatherEyes
Property.HelpText: Enable this to have Pachacamac's eyes be open only when he appears in a cutscene at the burning altar. Normally, he never opens them.

Property.name: PerfectChaosAttackSplines
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Super Sonic use the full 3 attack paths in the Perfect Chaos fight. Normally, the game cuts you off before you make it to the top.

Property.name: LevelClearPlus
Property.display: Level Clear Ending Animations + Red Mountain Fix
Property.HelpText: Makes some characters use their unused "Revert to idle from level clear stance" animations. Also fixes Red Mountain's cutscene as Sonic.

Property.name: LanderUse
Property.HelpText: Enable this to allow all characters to use their normally unused 'landing' animations. To see them, jump straight on a flat surface. More info in Readme.

Property.name: AnimatePLUS
Property.HelpText: Enable this fix a whole slew of animations issues with several characters, as well as add a few normally unused ones into the mix. Details in Readme.

Property.name: KnucklesAnimate
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give Knuckles alternate neutral and idle animations during boss fights, consisting of unused animations! Details in Readme.

Property.name: BigAnimate
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give Big more, normally unused animations after he stands idle for a while.

Property.name: AmyAnimate
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give Amy more, normally unused animations after she stands idle for a while, and after she recovers from being dizzy from spinning her hammer.

Property.name: TailsAnimate
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give Tails more, normally unused animations after he stands idle for a while.

Property.name: FinalEggAnnouncer
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make unused voice clips play at the start of Final Egg Act 1 when playing as Sonic.

Property.name: FinalEggColorDoor
Property.HelpText: Makes Eggman speak unused lines when at Amy's color door puzzle in Final Egg. He will taunt her when she chooses the wrong door, up to 3 times.

Property.name: SkyDeck1Announcer
Property.HelpText: Makes unused voice clips play at the start of Sky Deck Act 1 when playing as Sonic. (They don't play for Tails because reasons.)

Property.name: SkyDeck2Announcer
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make unused voice clips play when around the giant cannon in Sky Deck Act 2.

Property.name: SkyDeck3Announcer
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Eggman speak an unused line when the ship tilts 90 degrees in Sky Deck Act 3 when playing as Sonic.

Property.name: BetaRematch
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Gamma speak an unused line at the start of the E-101R boss fight.

Property.name: PerfectChaos
Property.HelpText: Adds a brief conversation between Super Sonic and Tikal at the start of the Perfect Chaos boss fight consisting of unused voice clips.

Property.name: FishingFailed
Property.HelpText: Enable this to: make Big's unused(?) failed fishing music play when he snaps his line, and make him speak two unused lines about it.

Property.name: WaterStuff
Property.HelpText: Makes an unused ambient underwater effect (Quiet) play whenever you submerge in water. Adds unused sound effects for exiting the water.

Property.name: LightSpeed
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make an unused sound effect play when Sonic charges up a light-speed attack/dash.

Property.name: TailsFlight
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make an unused sound effect (Quiet) play whenever Tails flies. (Leftover from Sonic Jam.)

Property.name: KnucklesHurt
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Knuckles speak an unused line that was most likely intended for whenever he took damage.

Property.name: AmyHurt
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Amy speak an unused line that was most likely intended for whenever she took damage.

Property.name: KnucklesNoRing
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Knuckles speak an unused line meant for when he gets hit while having no rings.

Property.name: AmyNoRing
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Amy speak an unused line meant for when she gets hit while having no rings.

Property.name: TailsNoRing
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Tails speak an unused line meant for when he gets hit while having no rings.

Property.name: BigNoRing
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Big speak an unused line meant for when he gets hit while having no rings.

Property.name: ItemVoices
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make other characters speak unused lines when they get certain items, like E-102 Gamma.

Property.name: BoatNoise
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make the vehicles that take you to and from the Egg Carrier to play unused sounds intended for when you boarded them.

Property.name: SkyChaseAlt
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Sonic and Tails say some different stuff in Sky Chase Act 2 when the tornado transforms when playing as Sonic.

Property.name: TailsTiredVoices
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give Tails two more voice clips to speak when he completely tires out while flying, both of which are normally unused.

Property.name: TailsRaceLines
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give the Sonic racing opponent 15 more lines of dialogue, all of which are normally unused.

Property.name: HotShelterNoises
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give all Acts of Hot Shelter background noise, with them changing based on where you are in the level. All noises are normally unused.

Property.name: FinalEggAlarmer
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make a normally unused alarm sound effect sound off at the start of Act 1 as Sonic.

Property.name: TailsStoryPlus
Property.HelpText: Enable this to add an unused line to the cutscene that occurs right after Tails defeats the Egg Walker.

Property.name: LostWorldNoises
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give all Acts of Lost World some background noise. For Act 2, it's only present when playing as Sonic, and only at the cliff at the start.

Property.name: LostWorldPlantNoise
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give the plant objects in Lost World a sound effect that was meant for them, normally unused, whenever you touch one.

Property.name: SnowmanSound
Property.HelpText: Enable this to give the Iceball enemy in IceCap an extra, normally unused sound when it walks around outside its machine. To hear it, attack it only once.

Property.name: BigRanker
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make Big comment on the size of the fish he just caught, using normally unused dialogue.

Property.name: ECParasolSound
Property.HelpText: Enable this to make destroying the chairs, tables, and parasols in Emerald Coast play a sound effect that normally isn't used in the level.
